changeSet.author: Pengap
changeSet.comment: 新建-第三方平台集成-企业微信租户用户表
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE `${table.prefix}social_cp_tenant_user` ( `id` bigint UNSIGNED NOT NULL COMMENT '主键', `tenant_id` varchar(255) CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci NOT NULL COMMENT '企业标识', `app_id` varchar(255) COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci NOT NULL COMMENT '应用标识', `cp_user_id` varchar(255) CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci NOT NULL COMMENT '第三方平台成员UserID。对应管理端的帐号，企业内唯一', `created_at` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP COMMENT '创建时间', `updated_at` timestamp NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP COMMENT '更新时间', PRIMARY KEY (`id`) USING BTREE, UNIQUE KEY `uk_tenant_user` (`tenant_id`,`app_id`,`cp_user_id`) USING BTREE ) ENGINE = InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET = utf8mb4 COLLATE = utf8mb4_unicode_ci COMMENT = '第三方平台集成-企业微信租户用户表';

changeSet.author: Pengap
changeSet.comment: 新建-第三方平台集成-企业微信用户绑定表
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE `${table.prefix}social_cp_user_bind` ( `id` bigint UNSIGNED NOT NULL COMMENT '主键', `user_id` bigint unsigned NOT NULL COMMENT '维格用户ID(关联#vika_user#id)', `cp_tenant_user_id` bigint unsigned NOT NULL COMMENT '企业微信租户用户ID(关联#vika_social_cp_tenant_user#id)', `created_at` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP COMMENT '创建时间', `updated_at` timestamp NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP COMMENT '更新时间', PRIMARY KEY (`id`) USING BTREE, UNIQUE KEY `uk_user_cp_tenant` (`user_id`,`cp_tenant_user_id`) USING BTREE ) ENGINE = InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET = utf8mb4 COLLATE = utf8mb4_unicode_ci COMMENT = '第三方平台集成-企业微信用户绑定表';

changeSet.author: Pengap
changeSet.comment: 新建-第三方平台集成-企业微信空间绑定域名表
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE `${table.prefix}social_tenant_domain` ( `id` bigint UNSIGNED NOT NULL COMMENT '主键', `tenant_id` varchar(255) CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci NOT NULL COMMENT '企业标识(关联#vika_social_tenant#id)', `space_id` varchar(50) COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '企业绑定的空间站标识', `domain_name` varchar(255) CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci NOT NULL COMMENT '企业专属域名', `status` tinyint unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '1' COMMENT '状态(0: 停用, 1: 启用)', `is_deleted` tinyint unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '删除标记(0:否,1:是)', `created_by` bigint(20) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '创建者', `updated_by` bigint(20) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '最后修改者', `created_at` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP COMMENT '创建时间', `updated_at` timestamp NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP COMMENT '更新时间', PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE = InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET = utf8mb4 COLLATE = utf8mb4_unicode_ci COMMENT = '第三方平台集成-企业租户专属域名表';
